title: Webpack browser schema for Build Facade.

main.description: The full path for the main entry point to the app, relative to the current workspace.

polyfills.description: The full path for the polyfills file, relative to the current workspace.

tsConfig.description: The full path for the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the current workspace.

scripts.description: Global scripts to be included in the build.

bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

styles.description: Global styles to be included in the build.

bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

inlineStyleLanguage.description: The stylesheet language to use for the application's inline component styles.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors.

includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to workspace root.

optimization.description: Enables optimization of the build output. Including minification of scripts and styles, tree-shaking, dead-code elimination, inlining of critical CSS and fonts inlining. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#optimization-configuration.

scripts.description: Enables optimization of the scripts output.

styles.description: Enables optimization of the styles output.

minify.description: Minify CSS definitions by removing extraneous whitespace and comments, merging identifiers and minimizing values.

inlineCritical.description: Extract and inline critical CSS definitions to improve first paint time.

fonts.description: Enables optimization for fonts. This option requires internet access. `HTTPS_PROXY` environment variable can be used to specify a proxy server.

inline.description: Reduce render blocking requests by inlining external Google Fonts and Adobe Fonts CSS definitions in the application's HTML index file. This option requires internet access. `HTTPS_PROXY` environment variable can be used to specify a proxy server.

fileReplacements.description: Replace compilation source files with other compilation source files in the build.
